name: web-qa-automation-framework
description: Project Overview -  This project is a Web UI test automation framework created to automate core user flow of a demo e-commerce web site using - https://www.saucedemo.com/.The goal of this project is to demonstrate practical QA automation skills, including test design, framework structure, and best practices using Playwright with TypeScript. Application Under Test - Demo e-commerce web application - https://www.saucedemo.com/. Main flows: - Authentication (login with valid/invalid credentials,logout) - Product Catalog (view products, sort,open details) - Cart (add items,remove items) - Checkout
